name: Are You NOCTURNAL? 3 Online Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only the letters in NOCTURNAL, that is an old-fashioned word that means soon.
questions.explanation:
Anon.

	Anon can also be an abbreviation for anonymous.  For instance, some people on the site choose to keep their real name anon.

questions.text: Using only letters in NOCTURNAL, find the name of a 1982 Disney character who also became a video game character the same year, and is also featured in a level of "Kingdom Hearts 2".
questions.explanation:
Tron.

	In 1982, a movie was released called "Tron".  That same year, that character became a video game character.  "Kingdom Hearts" and "Kingdom Hearts 2" involve characters from both "Final Fantasy" and from various Disney movies, and Tron is featured in the computer level.

questions.text: Using only letters from NOCTURNAL, find a 5-letter word for what you do when you say the numbers from 1-10.
questions.explanation:
Count.

	To count is to say the numbers, like "1, 2, 3, 4..."  A count can also be a vampire, like Count Dracula or Count Chocula.

questions.text: What is a 4-letter word meaning lend, using only letters from NOCTURNAL?
questions.explanation:
Loan.

	A loan is something you are renting, or lending, to someone.  Sometimes a loan will come with an interest, meaning you will have to pay back more than you borrowed.

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word, using only letters from NOCTURNAL, that means not in.
questions.explanation:
Out.

	Out means not in.  For instance, if you are not inside, you are outside.  Sometimes you can also be "on the outs", which means you don't fit in with a group.

questions.text: Using only letters from NOCTURNAL, find a 5-letter word for colorful creatures that make up reefs in the ocean.
questions.explanation:
Coral.

	Coral can be very pretty.  It is made of the skeletons of tiny dead sea creatures, such as plankton.  The world's largest reef is the Great Barrier Reef.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word meaning a killer whale, using only letters from NOCTURNAL.
questions.explanation:
Orca.

	Although it can be called a killer whale, orcas are actually a type of dolphin.  The reason they are called "killer" whales, though, is because they eat warm blooded animals, like seals.

questions.text: Using letters from NOCTURNAL, find a 3-letter word meaning bed.
questions.explanation:
Cot.

	A cot is a bed made for children.  It has sides so they don't fall out.  Cots can also be portable beds that can also fold up and slip under another bed.

questions.text: Using letters only found in NOCTURNAL, find a picnic pest of 3 letters.
questions.explanation:
Ant.

	There are many different species of ants.  The most common ants in America are red ants and little black ants.  Red ants bite, and it can hurt.  Ants are attracted to food, so when you have a picnic, sometimes they come try to steal your crumbs!

questions.text: Finally, using only letters from NOCTURNAL, find a 4-letter word for a family tribe.
questions.explanation:
Clan.

	Clan is a Scottish word for a family tribe.  There can be many different clans, or groups, of people in a community.
